sourceColumn.name: Source Column
sourceColumn.value: Column from which data is taken.

targetColumn.name: Target Column
targetColumn.value: Column where the result is displayed.

decimalPlaces.name: Decimal Places
decimalPlaces.value: A number of simbols after comma.

substringSearch.name: Substring searched for
substringSearch.value: Substring that is searched for in the sourceColumn.

position.name: Position
position.value: Position at which to start searching for a substring.
